name: Smart Share Taxi: Car Driving
description:
This time we give you the career mode, so you can develop your taxi driver skills and build the empire.
Smart Share Taxi: Car Driving will be constantly developed so you can buy the new cars, take a fare from dispatch, go to the other city zones. You'll love this free cab simulator.
features:

- Full 3D open world
- Cab driving simulator
- Career mode
- Engaging taxi driver gameplay
- Choose the passengers to pick up
